frameset.note: Frames file for 'provide' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'give'

example.name: transtive
example.text: This airline provides connecting service between Philly and Newark.
example.arg: connecting service between Philly and Newark

example.name: provide with
example.text: It is providing the new firm with almost $100 million in seed money.
example.arg: with almost $100 million in seed money

example.name: provide to
example.text: Hudson General provides maintenance and other services to airlines and airports

example.name: odd discourse-level usage
example.text: I would be happy to do this, *trace* provided John pays his parking tickets.
example.note: (trace is not linked to anything and gets no Arg; sometimes it isn't present)
